metadata.name: Chili
metadata.description: Like many comic book fans, young Mike Alvarez dreams of one day drawing his favorite heroes and working with legends like Stan 'The Man' Lee. Those dreams change rapidly when Mike accidentally illustrates the blank pages of a magical compendium, thus transforming him into the mighty Chili! Join Mike, his sidekick Skip, and the most bizarre villains you've ever encountered, as our unlikely hero fights for all of humanity against the diabolical Taco Bravo!
